Package com.cognizant.controller

Class ReimbursementRequestsController

java.lang.Object
com.cognizant.controller.ReimbursementRequestsController
@RestController @RequestMapping("api/reimbursements") public class ReimbursementRequestsController extends Object
Controller class for handling reimbursement requests. Manages endpoints related to reimbursements requests.

  • Method Details

    • addNewReimbursementRequest

      @PostMapping(path="add", consumes="multipart/form-data") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<NewReimbursementRequestsDTO> addNewReimbursementRequest(@Valid @ModelAttribute @Valid NewReimbursementRequestsDTO newReimbursementRequestsDTO) throws IOException, ExpenseExceedsException, InvalidInvoiceDateException
      Adds a new reimbursement request.
      Parameters:
      newReimbursementRequestsDTO - The DTO containing details of the new reimbursement request.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the created reimbursement request or a BAD_REQUEST status if unsuccessful.
      Throws:
      ParseException - If there is an issue parsing data (e.g., date format).
      ExpenseExceedsException - If the expense exceeds a certain limit.
      InvalidInvoiceDateException - If the invoice date is invalid.
      IOException

    • getAllReimbursementsForTravelRequestId

      @GetMapping("{travelrequestid}/requests") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ReimbursementDTO>> getAllReimbursementsForTravelRequestId(@PathVariable("travelrequestid") int travelRequestId) throws ReimbursementRequestsNotFoundException
      Retrieves all reimbursement requests associated with a specific travel request ID.
      Parameters:
      travelRequestId - The ID of the travel request.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of reimbursement requests or a BAD_REQUEST status if not found.
      Throws:
      ReimbursementRequestsNotFoundException - If no reimbursement requests are found for the given ID.

    • getReimbursementById

      @GetMapping("{reimbursementid}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReimbursementDTO> getReimbursementById(@PathVariable("reimbursementid") int reimbursementId) throws ReimbursementRequestsNotFoundException
      Retrieves all reimbursement requests associated with a specific reimbursement request ID.
      Parameters:
      reimbursementId - The ID of the reimbursement request.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with reimbursement request or a BAD_REQUEST status if not found.
      Throws:
      ReimbursementRequestsNotFoundException - If no reimbursement requests are found for the given ID.

    • processReimbursementById

      @PutMapping("{reimbursementid}/process") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProcessReimbursementDTO> processReimbursementById(@PathVariable("reimbursementid") int reimbursementId, @RequestBody ProcessReimbursementDTO processReimbursementDTO) throws ReimbursementRequestsNotFoundException, InvalidStatusException, EmptyRemarkFoStatusException
      Processes a reimbursement request by its ID.
      Parameters:
      reimbursementId - The ID of the reimbursement request.
      processReimbursementDTO - The DTO containing processing details.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the processed reimbursement request or a BAD_REQUEST status if unsuccessful.
      Throws:
      ReimbursementRequestsNotFoundException - If the reimbursement request is not found.
      InvalidStatusException - If an invalid status is encountered during processing.
      EmptyRemarkFoStatusException - If the remark for the status is empty.
